main event: A civilian observed a round, brilliant object that suddenly became aflame and shot across the sky in Alexandria, Louisiana on September 2, 1949.
interesting points: The object was only in view for 5 seconds.
There was no evidence of exhaust or trails, and no sound was heard.
The object did not appear to be supported by any discernible means.
The object was comparable in brightness to the dazzling sun.
The sighting occurred at approximately 11:30 PM local time.
sighted object: a round, brilliant object that suddenly became aflame and shot across the sky
